name: Baldr
description:
Become one with the GODS. Fight for your village. Wipe out all the Frost giants and become the hero your village needs you to be.

  • Nordic Mythology 
  • Melee combat in a tower defense game 
  • Feeling that gods are present

Baldr team: 

  • Simon Buyck 
  • Arnaud Sougnez 
  • Lucas Van Baeveghem
  • Jorik Weymans
